summary:
•	Strategic and innovative manager with 9 years of operational and managerial experience in the pharmaceutical supply chain industry.
•	Experienced in RFP, budget planning for the entire APAC region.
•	Proficient in authoring, reviewing and approving corporate policies and divisional SOPs.
•	Quality-focused, possess in-depth QMS knowledge – RM, CCM, CAPA, supplier qualification.
•	Well-versed in facility operational and technical set-up, such as temperature mapping, RF scanner, as well as on-going maintenance requirement.
•	Highly collaborative and adaptive, yet assertive and determined.
